title: A treatise of the holy catholike faith and Church Diuided into three bookes. By Thomas Iackson Dr. in Diuinitie, chaplaine to his Maiestie in ordinarie, and vicar of Saint Nicolas Church in the towne of Newcastle vpon Tyne. The first booke.
author: Jackson, Thomas, 1579-1640.
publisher: Printed by M[iles] F[lesher] for Iohn Clarke, and are to be sold at his shop vnder St. Peters Church in Cornehill,
notes: The first part of book 12 of the author's "Commentaries upon the Apostles Creed"; parts 2 and 3 were published posthumously in his Works.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
